ingredients.item: 1 tbsp each frozen Cooks’ Ingredients Ginger, Garlic and Red Chilli
180g pack frozen essential Waitrose White Rice
½ x 200g pack sugar snaps, finely sliced
125g pack Tenderstem broccoli tips, cut into 4cm pieces
½ x 235g pack frozen essential Waitrose Raw King Prawns
½ x 28g pack coriander, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Warm a wok or large non-stick frying pan over a high heat. When very hot add the oil, ginger, garlic and chilli, quickly followed by the rice. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until the rice defrosts.

Add the sugar snaps and broccoli and stir-fry for a further 2 minutes. Add the prawns and half the salad onions and half the coriander. Continue to stir-fry for another 6 minutes or until the prawns are pink.
Remove from the heat and drizzle over the fish sauce and lime juice. Scatter over the remaining salad onions and coriander before serving.
